name: Jurassic Park III
overview:
Jurassic Park III is a 3D lightgun rail shooter played from a first-person perspective. It is based on the movie of the same name and like in the movie it takes place on Isla Sorna. The game starts with a two-man rescue team parasailing down to the island. The team receives orders to search for victims of an accident. Apparently things have gone horribly wrong.

The game moves the character automatically while searching the island. Players have to gun down various dinosaurs from the movie like raptors, a spinosaurus and a t-rex. In addition to the lightgun the player can hit an escape button to evade the dinosaurs attacks. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
